name: volt-absorb

effect.x-y: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.

short_effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.x-y: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
